name: Ether Cards Founder Series, ID:6704
description: Ether Cards Founder Series First Edition Card

traits.name: Limited Trait Slot
traits.description: A Limited Trait Slot for one of the Fundamental Traits

traits.name: Reforge
traits.description: One time ability to re-randomize any (or all) selected layers in the main accidental art image of the card

traits.name: Alpha Upgrade
traits.description: Replace this card with an Alpha card from Ethercard’s vault (replacement card is chosen by Ethercards)

traits.name: Synthesis Ritual
traits.description: Uses the grid to create a forgeable layer set. Details later.

traits.name: Merch
traits.description: Some cards can get a special trait that can be burned for a physical item ( ethercards hoodie, etc ) (shipping fees apply)

title: Accidental Collaboration
